name: Clin N

notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in the field CS Mets at DX.

**Note 2:**  Regional nodes include unilateral, bilateral or contralateral involvement of named node(s).
